mapper.select: SELECT parentTask.* FROM dp_inst_task INSTASK INNER JOIN dp_conf_task_relation RELATION ON INSTASK.FTASKID=RELATION.FSONTASKID INNER JOIN dp_inst_task parentTask ON parentTask.FTASKID=RELATION.fparentTaskid and parentTask.fnodeinstId=INSTASK.fnodeinstId WHERE INSTASK.FID=#{taskInstanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select FNodeInstId from dp_inst_task where FId = #{taskInstanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select FUserDataId from dp_inst_task where FId = #{taskInstanceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
